Reviews.Title: CUTE!
Reviews.Author: Rach_Dupont
Reviews.Content: I have no scratches on my new phone, came in box with everything. Was a little disapointed it took a few days extra but I do live quite a way from the sender. Very happy!

ProductInfo.Features:
5-megapixel auto-focus camera
Capture DVD-quality video/Dolby mobile audio technology
Bluetooth 2.1 connectivity with stereo music streaming (A2DP) capabilities
Digital audio player/Video player
Its 1000 mAh lithium-ion battery is rated at up to 3 hours of talk time, and up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time. It runs on the 850/900/1800/1900 MHz GSM/GPRS/EDGE
ProductInfo.Name: Lg Gt950 Arena Unlocked for Any Gsm
